Menu of the Day

One day, One Meal !
You can choose between classic menu or veggie.

404 Classic Menu (Monday)

This is the classic menu, with classic food and classic ingredients.

404 Veggie Menu (Monday)

This is the veggie menu with everything like classic but veggie.

How it works ?

Order

Choose what daily menu you want to eat and order with the form below.

Preparation

The morning of the daily menu we go the market buy fresh ingredients and prepare your meal.

Delivery

Once everything is cooked, we will deliver the food in your place.

Want to order your food ?

Complete this form so we take your order and deliver your meal

Let's keep in touch!

Find us on any of these platforms, we respond 1-2 business days.
